author: Hadlee Simons
title: MTN reveals iPhone 6S date too
text:
Are you covered? Compare quotes for car, life and business insurance right now! 
Sign up for your free fax number and get faxes sent to your inbox! MTN reveals iPhone 6S date too Article By: Hadlee Simons Mon, 05 Oct 2015 2:03 PM Share Your Email The Apple iPhone 6S. 
A few days after Vodacom revealed a launch date for the iPhone 6S range, MTN has done the same. 
Much like Vodacom, the yellow network revealed that it will be launching Apple's new smartphones on October 16. 
The company is already allowing users to pre-register for the device too. 
So what should Apple fans expect when their new phone arrives then? 
You're looking at an A9 processor, 2GBs of RAM, a 12-megapixel camera with 4K video recording and iOS9. 
But the biggest change is no doubt to the display, which now features 3D Touch technology. 
This technology allows the phone to differentiate between a tap and a press - think of it as a right-click of sorts. Read More
